comment: He was very helpful and understanding if you needed to miss a test day. Super funny and it was a joy to come to class.
RIP Professor Bowers.
Great professor.  I had no interest in Science or this class but he keeps it interesting.  Posts material on-line for you to access and review prior to class.  Provides study guides.

Great Prof. and well worth getting up on a Saturday morning,just grab a cup of Joe on the way.  Prof. Bowers keeps you interested in the material and relates it to your every day experiences. As for attendance,come if you want or don't, just don't be late. However, if you don't come, it could make ALL the difference at the end of the semester.

a GREAT WAY to spend a Saturday morning.  I enjoyed his class a lot.  Very Passionate about Science.  The labs were misleading.  I didn't  think his tests were hard if you read his lectures and participate in the class you will do fine.  Do the extra credit.

Bowers is awesome!  He cracks jokes in class and dresses so casual he's like one of the students!  He's very passionate about people being on time for tests and for class activities.  Great teacher, but does require studying!  Definitely recommended for a Saturday class!!
Awesome professor!! His class was really easy and I hate science!  His notes are online and you dont need the book because you never use it! I would highly recommend him if you want to get an A.
Great teacher - very laid back. Has strict "on time" attendance for test days. Makes science fun with his sense of humor and personal approach. Recommend highly!

If you want to get an "A" take this class.  You don't need a book.  He lectures from his powerpoint slides that are posted before class on his website.  His class does require some studying if you want an "A".  If you just want to pass read the lectures before his tests & you will do fine.
No book required, multiple choice tests(only two) and quizzes, gives extra credit. He is a cool guy who loves science and teaching. What more can you ask for.

This Professor is great!. His test comes out of his lectures which are pretty easy. You won't need the textbook because he will post the lectures and activities on his web site (before class), so print them out!!!

He's a great professor to have at 8 in the morning. He's full of energy and has a good sense of humor. He deffinetly keeps you awake, and he's very aware of what people are doing in his class. You don't have to buy the book for his class and his tests come directly from his lectures (that he posts online). It's not an easy A class, but it's fun.

Larry the Cable Guy Teaches Science!. Can't think of a better way to spend a saturday morning than in one of his classes. (well ok that's a stretch) Very entertaining and enthused. Course material is science for dummies but it's fun.
Tests are on lectures in class but what he stresses in his lectures doesn't always show up on the test. At the same time, he will test on random facts he skimmed over in class.
Young and excited and definitely trying out his powers. He's quick to let you know who's boss - very childish!
Nice guy, but the class sucked. Taught totally of the powerpoints, which didnt really make much sense. The tests were ridiculously difficult.

Do the labs and try you get an A do the extra credit and turn it in on the day of the final and you will get a full 20pts if you turn it in on that day; this guy is easy I got a C in this class because I didnt try!!!!

Bowers is great. His lectures were always exciting. He really really really likes science and what he does. He made me like coming to class. Always helpful and extremely friendly. I took this class on a Saturday morning at 8am, and was able to attend the labs right after class most days. All you have to do is DO THE WORK. Study his slides for tests

Great professor, He knows his stuff. He is willing to answer questions, but you as the student have to ask them. The labs are required work, but as long as you but forth the effort he will see that you are trying.
Nice guy, hard class. The material in the course was extremely hard and the labs didn't really relate to what we were studying. He was funny and helpful but his tests are pretty tough.
kinda random lectures, he got real upset with our class half way through the semester. likes to talk but can get a little caried away at times.

This guy is enthusiastic, and seems to really know his stuff.  Clearly, he's not yet jaded and bitter and phoning it in like so many others at KSU. The labs are useless, but I guess that's not his fault. Stays focused and tries to keep lectures light with cornball humor. Pay attention & you'll pass.

Loves to lecture. There is a lot of outside work. I spent most of the semester doing work for this class.  He always takes a lab so you must do them. He also has you do article questions. His tests are tough. Great personality.But a hard class.
Really loves to talk about science. Lectures are very enjoyable.
